column1: 25366484$Elemental HERO Shining Flare Wingman$$LIGHT$[Warrior/fusion]$$$$$8$2500$2100$$"Elemental HERO Flame Wingman" + "Elemental HERO Sparkman"$$Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways.
